synopsis.p: Converts into a an algorithm known to OpenNLPDocumentCategorizerTrain.

string-conversion.p:
Only the following values are accepted:
naive-bayes, nb
generalized-iterative-scaling, gis
perceptron
quasi-newton, qn, l-bfgs, lbfgs, bfgs

xml-conversion.p: or ALGO ALGO is converted into the algorithm as specified by the string conversion.
